Background

I'm currently working as a Research and Development Engineer at ZappyHire converting innovtive ideas into code.

As a developer, I enjoy building scalable and readable code — combining my chronophobia with my coding skills to provide the best algorithms. I also love to attend hackathons. I've been — attending hackathons for the past 3 years and won a few. On a mission to develop small yet effective algos. Used to be a freelancer got tired of html after 2 years and got into recommendation engines and relative intelligence — I believe relative intelligence is the best way to reach singularity :-).

When I'm not in front of a computer screen, I'm probably fishing, hiking or crossing off another item on my bucket list.

Currently seeking full-time opportunities!
